parameters.name: AddonName
parameters.description: The add-on name. You must specify at least one of the AddonName and EnvironmentType parameters.

parameters.name: EnvironmentType
parameters.description:
The environment type. You must specify at least one of the AddonName and EnvironmentType parameters.

Valid values:

*   CS

    <!-- -->

    :

    <!-- -->

    Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK)

    <!-- -->

*   ECS

    <!-- -->

    :

    <!-- -->

    Elastic Compute Service (ECS)

    <!-- -->

*   Cloud

    <!-- -->

    :

    <!-- -->

    cloud service

    <!-- -->

parameters.name: FeePackage
parameters.description:
The payable resource plan.

*   If the EnvironmentType parameter is set to CS, set the value to CS_Basic or CS_Pro. Default value: CS_Basic.
*   Otherwise, leave the parameter empty.

Valid values:

*   CS_Pro: Container Monitoring Pro
*   CS_Basic: Container Monitoring Basic

parameters.name: FilterRegionIds
parameters.description: The region IDs to be queried.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.
